item.description:
Summer is almost over, but let's enjoy it while we can. Join us for a fun day trip to Rhode Island's Block Island. We will meet at Point Judith to catch the ferry to Block Island. You can bring your own bike or rent a bike on the island. After riding an hour-long ferry to Block Island we will go and rent bikes for those in the group that need one. For those that don't want to bike ride, you can walk to our first meeting point at Mohegan's Bluff (3 mile walk). Bike rentals are approximately $20 for the day.

From the bike rentals we will ride to Oaks Bluff (South side of the Island and stop at the Lighthouse just before Mohegan Bluffs. The scenery is beautiful and spectacular. then it is a short ride to Mohegan Bluffs from the Lighthouse. We walk the 141 steps down to the beach and have lunch. see this link for pics of Block Island. http://www.blockislan...

After lunch we will bike around the rest of the Island. We will meet back in center of town where you can get ice cream and do some shopping. From one end of Block island to the other is probably 8 miles or so. We plan to catch the 5:30 pm ferry back to Point Judith and have some fried clams before coming back to Boston.


Please be early to catch the 10:30 am ferry to Block Island. Plan for a one hour and 45 minute drive from Boston to Point Judith. You will also have to factor in time for parking and buying the ferry tix.

Time: 10:30 AM ferry

we will return on the 5:30 PM ferry back to Point Judith.

Cost: Adult round trip tix - $18.65
Bicycle round trip tix - $ 6.10 (if you have a bike)
Full day parking - $15

Carpooling - we do encourage carpooling since it is 1.5 hour drive to the ferry. Please indicate if you can provide a ride or need a ride and where from. Suggested carpool fee to help cover the cost for gas and parking is $12.
